name: A Political Marriage
description:
Play as one of two princesses (with choice of pronouns) and use all your cunning, pigheadedness, and moxie to bring about the end of the war and the beginning of your marriage.

Features:

  • 100,000+ words of content
  • Texting! Branching choices! Shenanigans galore!
  • Two playable characters
  • Choice of name and pronouns
  • Remember choices on subsequent playthroughs

Play the online DEMO here.

Issues and questions can be directed at Leah: leahthecase@gmail.com.
